Others: All the pipelines and wiring will be concealed.    Premium bathroom, kitchen and flooring equipments.    Regulation status of the apartment: The apartment and the building are fully compliant with government regulations.    Relevant permission is being obtained.    Construction status: The foundation work is completed.    Apartment prebooking: BOOKING OPEN    ETA on delivery/completion: April 2020. Completion certificate will be provided. About the Project  Overview  Mana Tropicale Sarjapur Road, Bangalore is one of the finest project developed by Mana Projects Pvt. Ltd. Spanning across 9.5 Acres of lush greenery, this project offers 1, 2, 3 BHKs & duplex apartments situated amidst more than 690 Silver Oak & Mahogany Trees.  Flat rates of Mana Tropicale are very competitive & affordable to suit every segment of buyers.  About the Project  The tranquil surroundings of this a magnificent project is set to reboot your lifestyle. Loaded with a bunch of modern amenities like clubhouse, swimming pool, gymnasium, basketball, badminton court, children play area and many more other recreational facilities this residential wonder welcomes you to wonderful living with your family.  Uniquely designed to allow maximum flow of fresh air & sunlight across every room, the well-ventilated residential apartments of Mana Tropicale will make lively and energetic all along the day. The gorgeous modern fittings & fixtures of these residential units will certainly fascinate you.  Planned aesthetically with spacious floor plans, these residential apartments invite you live a lavish lifestyle you always yearned for. These vaastu compliant abodes assure you live a healthy & wealthy life.   Highpoints  Proximity to several IT companies & Tech Parks like WIPRO, RGA Tech Park, Pritech Park, RMZ Eco Space, Tech Mahindra, TCS, Infosys, HCL and Robert Bosch is the main USP of this township. Mane Tropicale is a true blessing for professional working Sarjapur Road & Electronic City. Connectivity to public transport is another prime feature of this locality.  Some of the well-known educational institutions & hospitals found within close vicinity include Harvest International School, Primus International School, St. Patricks Academy, PES University, Blossom Multispecialty Hospital, VIMS Hospital and Sakra World Hospital. Book a flat now in Mane Tropicale Sarjapur Road and make your life truly worth living.

Prestige Smart City is Pre-Launch its New Residential Apartment locating Sarjapur Road Bangalore. The project offers 1, 2, 3 and 4 Bedroom luxury apartments' row houses, villa homes and studio apartments across various budget ranges. This residential development is spread across a vast land area with abundant greenery making it a better dwelling place. Prestige Smart City is offered with most lavishing amenities to lead a peaceful life. Prestige Smart City allows the residents to have the best specification and configuration of the residential units. Investing in real property reaps large go back on investments mainly in emerging localities. Prestige Smart City by way of Prestige Group is one such project which caters to needs of citizens searching out alternatives to invest. Services are masses to ensure a safe and secure environment. Prestige Groups has firmly established itself as one of the leading and most successful developers of real estate in India by setting its own standards. Prestige Group was found in the year 1986, has a list of completed projects numbering 210, with 53 on-going projects and 35 upcoming projects. Prestige Group are the only developers in South India to have a wide diverse portfolio covering residential, commercial, retail, leisure and hospitality segments. With 205 landmark developments across the city, the company has its projects all across south India which includes Chennai, Kochi, Hyderabad, Mangalore, Mysore and Goa. Prestige Tranquillity, Prestige Misty Waters, Prestige Ferns Residency, Prestige Silver Oak, Prestige Royal Woods are some of the completed residential projects by Prestige Groups. Prestige Smart City is coming up in prime locales of Bangalore, surrounded by well-planned neighbourhood with excellent social and physical infrastructure. Bangalore is known to be one of the rapidly-growing cites of India since the past few decades. IT has been the major growth driver for this extensive real estate development in the city. Bangalore has a multi-cultural population with good social framework, reputed educational institutes, good health care facilities and acclamatory climatic conditions. The proposed infrastructure initiatives by the Government like Peripheral Ring Road, Metro Rail, Signal Free ORR, High Speed Rail Link, Mono Rail, and Elevated Expressway have positively impacted the realty market of the city. Prestige Smart City from Majestic via Sarjapur main road. From majestic, head south to continue onto Gubbi Thotadappa road. Make a U-turn at tank bund road, at Sangolli Rayanna circle take the 2nd exit onto Seshadri road. At Kreishanrajendra circle take the third exit onto Nrupathunga road, at corporation circle take the first exit onto Kasturba road. Now turn right towards Devanga Samaja road, continue to move on. Turn left at HCG Cancer Hospital, tower 4 on Kalinga Rao road. From here continue straight onto Mission road, stay left on mission road. Turn left onto Langford road later turn right at CMP junction onto Hosur road, continue straight on Hosur road. Now turn left onto Sarjapur main road, continue to NH44. From NH44 move slightly right onto Ambalipura-Sarjapura road or Sarjapura main road. Turn left onto V. Kallahalli main road continue to move to find the destination on right.

APARTMENTS  Experience A Refreshing Life  SJR Blue Waters  The nature and scenic beauty is something that connects us to better to ourselves and to one another. It also makes us to feel an organic part of nature and showcases how we were really meant to live. At SJR Blue Waters you live beside the vast, surrounded by pristine Kudlu Lake, it is located at Sai Sree Layout, Parappana Agrahara, Bangalore. Spread on 16 acres of picturesque greenery, Blue Water from SJR Prime Corp comprises of 2 BHK,2.5 BHK and 3 BHK apartments. You will discover breathtaking views of nature while standing in the balcony of your home at SJR Blue Waters. Located in the most happening area of Bangalore, this peaceful apartment complex exists right in the middle of Bangalores IT corridor. Surrounded by Sarjapur Road, Electronic City, BTM Layout, and Koramangala, Blue Waters is precisely located in the best locality. This pristine apartment is just few minutes drive from NICE Road. Turn off Hosa Roadand take the short drive to the luxury enclave that makes your journey worthy.  More Than Living  Experience Life  SJR Blue Waters is a lakefront residential property that has 11 blocks of 1 BHK, 2 BHK, 3 BHK and 4BHK apartments. Alongside the waterfront are striking G+18 floor towers which are bound by nature and natural ambiance. From grand entrance at the northern side, experience nature welcoming to you and when you go ahead, have a view of beautiful and quiet tree-lined avenue which brings you in past cycling track, golf greens and the market plaza. This apartment complex offers the feel of completeness to its residents. SJR Blue Waters comprises lavish amenities that create a perfect living choice for your happy living. A winding boulevard goes past the buildings, landscaped gardens, water feature, Oyester clubhouse, and swimming pools.  The east part of the residential project hold the other half of the apartment blocks are spread largely with open spaces, tennis courts and amphitheater. The eastern entrance provides easy access.  More than a lake, SJR Blue Waters offers you with to live life that is stress-free and worry-free. Of course you will always have the lake to cool down your senses. Unwind yourself while staying at this apartment complex. Blue Waters blends contemporary style with thoughtful and innovative design, each home here offers abundant open space for comfortable living. Each apartment in the floor is designed to meet the utmost privacy level. When you step in to living room and bedroom of Blue Waters where you will realize how much comfort and contented you will feel right away. Insightful planning of Blue Waters ensures that no space is wasted and the location of doors and windows does not interfere with the movement or the placement of furniture or any other furnishing things. This space utilization is also carried to all other rooms and areas of SJR Blue Waters. Enjoy your best moments with a cup of coffee and have a view of lake from your private balcony. With beautiful view of the nature, experience an ever-refreshing breeze.

Sumo Sonnet is strategically located and provides direct connectivity to nearly all other major points in and around Bangalore. It is one of the most reputable address of the city with easy access to many famed schools, shopping areas, hospitals, recreational areas, public gardens and several other public amenities.  Hosur Road- Sarjapur Road- ORR Connectivity  Builder Information:. Sumo Sonnet is built by Sumo Properties. It's a leading group in real-estate market in Bangalore. The team of this builder group is known for its superior work and punctual delivery of high-end Residential Apartments developed precisely in accordance with the pre-defined specifications.  Units and interiors:. Sumo Sonnet offers 2 BHK and 3 BHK Apartments of many sizes. The magnitude of area included in this property vary depending on the number of BHK's. Sumo Sonnet is spread over an area of 1.00 acres with 14 floors. The master plan of Sumo Sonnet is designed in such a way that these Apartments comprises of wide space with proper ventilation at every corner of the house. The interiors are beautifully crafted with designer tiled floor, granite counter slab in kitchen, modern sanitary fittings in the bathroom and huge windows for proper sunlight.  Comforts and Amenities:. The amenities offered in Sumo Sonnet are Badminton Court, Car Parking, Club House, Gymnasium, Jogging Track, Landscaped Garden, Lift, Party Area, Rain Water Harvesting and Swimming Pool. All these features together assure many choices to relax, revitalise and relish at own home. Prestige Pine Wood is a High-Rise Residential Development in the midst of a well-established and sought after location, at Koramangala (Jakkasandara) Bangalore. Koramangala, located at the heart of the city has good proximity to IT hub and recreational zones. Prestige Pine Wood consist of 256 premium apartments and offers a combination of 2, 2.5, 3 and 4 bedroom units, and sits on a prime land of 2.5 acres and is placed in such a way that it provides maximum natural light and ventilation. The master plan of these properties offers the finest view of the adjacent landscaped parks, and the overall architecture and space planning has been designed explicitly to spell luxury. A well-integrated club house is closely knit within the towers with modern amenities such as a mini theatre, banquet hall, gymnasium, billiards & TT room, along with a swimming pool and a spa. The building facade is contemporary with straight lines and an imaginative use of understated colours and textures have been used that underpin the word Pine Wood. The Landscape and views that are captured from all around only enhance the feel of space and unobstructed expanse making it a truly pleasurable place to be. The use of modern tasteful materials and finishes finally complete the overall theme that the design seeks to achieve. Explore this micro-site to discover more about Prestige Pine Wood.

About the Location  Bengaluru, the Silicon Valley of India, is growing very fast in the IT/ITeS sector. The city is the hub of major IT giants who have set up their establishment here. In fact, the start-ups and many small companies are also eventually shifting their base from different parts of India to Bengaluru due to its growing infrastructure and market opportunity.  This is pushing the employment opportunities, which in turn, is increasing the demand for residential real estate in India. Electronic City is one such location in Bengaluru that has the largest industrial technology parks and over 200 IT/ITeS companies currently operational. The area consists of zones that have few renowned companies functioning such as Wipro Ltd, Tata, Genpact, HCL Technologies, General Electric, etc. Not only this, there are many other companies functioning in the region in various industries as well.  Due to the growth of commercial space, people have migrated to Bengaluru for better job opportunities. This has also pushed the real estate residential demand in Electronic city and its nearby areas.  Development in and around Electronic City is immense, major reputed educational institutions and medical facilities are located nearby. At Doddathougur road one can easily find various social infrastructure such as colleges, institutes, hospitals, restaurants & all sorts of shops for your daily needs.  Electronic city has great connectivity to the other parts of the city too. Electronic City Flyover connects the Hosur Road within 3-4 minutes and Silk Board in 10-12 minutes. The Electronic City flyover connects the Nice Ring Road touching further to Nice Bangalore-Mysore Expressway and other parts of the city through the Outer Ring Road. Electronic City has good road connectivity. It has a great frequency of Bangalore Metropolitan Transport Corporation (BMTC) and Bangalore International Airport Ltd (BIAL) buses.  The easy connectivity is making Electronic City a favorite destination among the residents and working professionals.  The working class usually wants to stay near to their workplace. The mid-level IT professional opts for affordable properties here. The upcoming metro connectivity to Electronic City will be a relief for the daily commuters. The phase 2 of Bengaluru Metro will connect 16 stations, thus, improving the connectivity.

Being a BDA layout, the locality enjoys good amenities such as parks, BWSSB water and wide roads. In addition, the area lies in proximity to IT hubs such as Manyata Tech Park and Kirloskar Tech Park. Furthermore, the layout is also located en route to the new International Airport(KIAL). Kalyan Nagar is the post office and pin code is 560043. Adjoining Kammanahalli main road has evolved as a major shopping street over the years. Hennur bus depot is located just outside the layout. Other neighboring areas are HRBR layout,Hennur, Nagawara, Lingarajpuram, Kamanahalli and Banaswadi. Hebbal, at a distance of 4 km is a major transport hub. Our Villas are designed to celebrate nature at its best. Welcoming enough light and ventilation, the spaces inside our homes bring in serenity into our daily affairs. The foyer connects to the living, dining, kitchen at lobby/ground level and to two bedrooms at each lower and upper level. Each Villa has a seamless transition from interior to exterior spaces, with timber-lined full-width sliding windows system, that extend onto a wooden deck and garden. Our homes romanticize the pleasure of changing seasons  may it be the freshness after rains or the lazy summers and chilling winters or the blossoming spring. The selective use of natural materials provides a warm texture to the whole living experience here. The four bedroom split-level design of these villas has their focal point as a courtyard, whereon all spaces open to.

Utility Terrace: All the dish antennas and wires to each floor will be taken from here in concealed fitment as part of premium feature of the apartment. Others: All the pipelines and wiring will be concealed.    Premium bathroom, kitchen and flooring equipments.    Regulation status of the apartment: The apartment and the building are fully compliant with government regulations.    Relevant permission is being obtained.    Construction status: The foundation work is completed.    Apartment prebooking: BOOKING OPEN    ETA on delivery/completion: April 2020. Completion certificate will be provided. Quality lifestyle living in Belgaum - 2 & 3 bhk dwelling apartments.    The apartment building is being built on 60-40 plot in Kaveri Nagar. The apartment is facing a playground and therefore it enjoys the open spaces from all round.    Vastu complaint flats, creative spaces, designed by a creative team of architects from Bangalore.    The flats are being planned considering the accessibility of the senior citizens and differently abled people.    All the flats will be fitted with Louvers, so that Sun rays from the West will not heat up the homes in summers. These are foldable/removable on your wish.    Typical flat: 6 units. 3 floors. 2 units on each floor.    2bhk, bigger bedrooms and kitchen. Utility balcony attached with kitchen. Pooja place. Dinning place. Walk-in closet. Larger balcony. Tall glass windows in the bedroom for better lighting and space. 2 bathrooms.    Approx 950 to 1000 Sqft - carpet area.    Penthouse: 1 unit. 4th floor + 1.    3 BHK. Lots of space. Garden area. Larger balconies. Feel of a villa on 4th floor. 3 bathrooms. 2 private terraces.   Several premium features such as open dinning area and small library place. Approx 2200 sqft of carpet area. Priced around 1 Cr.    Ground floor: 1 big hall for society catch up and sit out area for discreet guests/sales men/service providers - etc.    Multi purpose hall: it can be used for birthday parties/kitty party or a small reception or social get together.    It will also have barbeque pits/tandoor pits.    Common Terrace: Can be used as common garden area.    Utility Terrace: All the dish antennas and wires to each floor will be taken from here in concealed fitment as part of premium feature of the apartment.    Water tank will also be located on this terrace. Limited access to this terrace for safety purposes.    Lift: Fast premium lift will be fitted.    Safety and Security: Most important feature of the apartment.    As seen on the picture, the parking place will be concealed and will not have direct access to the apartments. The entry of the apartment is only from one door that leads to the hall on the ground floor. The security gates will be electronically controlled from within the apartment.    Others: All the pipelines and wiring will be concealed.    Premium bathroom, kitchen and flooring equipments.    Regulation status of the apartment: The apartment and the building are fully compliant with government regulations.    Relevant permission is being obtained.    Construction status: The foundation work is completed.    Apartment prebooking: BOOKING OPEN    ETA on delivery/completion: April 2020. Completion certificate will be provided.    Home Loans approved by LIC Housing Finance.   Photos:   1. Apartment from the front.    2. Typical 2 BHK floor plan.    3. Pent house floor plan (+1 Pent house floor is missing from the images due to website upload constraint).    4. Parking area.
